SEARCH
Package chessapi4j.functional

Class Game.Builder

java.lang.Object
chessapi4j.functional.Game.Builder
Enclosing class:
Game
public static class Game.Builder extends Object
Builder for open Game instances.

To create an open Game instance, you need to provide the tags: event, site, date, round, white, and black.

The RepetitionsMode is set to RepetitionsMode.STRICT by default, but it can be changed.
